name: Alien Hunter (Vincentius Arianto)
description:
Alien Hunter is a survival game made with Unity Engine for a university course. The objective of the game is to defend your cattle and survive the night to reach the next day. 

Controls:

You attack the enemy, collect power up, and navigate the menu by tapping the touchscreen
